testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access Expense Head List via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/getExpenseHead endpoint with valid authorization
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/getExpenseHead" path parameters....................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed * The api user verifies the information in the response body for the entry with the specified 0 index, including "Building rent", "", "yes", "no" and "2021-10-25 13:50:41"..passed
